A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Haters gonna hate\, but ignore the Jar Jar fans. This is a movie for old school fans who love the twists and turns of the original films. If you loved the moment that you learned Vadar was Luke's father\, you'll like this flick. If you liked Jar Jar Binks flopping all over the screen\, stay home. Daisy steals the show\, but Carrie stopped me in my tracks with her performance. Enjoy this one\, true fans! Resist the haters.
